document.full_text: in a week when many broadway productions had relatively modest ticket sales, three shows - the musicals "the book of mormon" and "sister act," and the new play "war horse" - demonstrated strength at the box office.
document.title: broadway grosses on the eve of the tony nominations
lines_and_colors: in a week when many broadway productions had relatively modest ticket sales, three shows - the musicals "the book of mormon" and "sister act," and the new play "war horse" - demonstrated strength at the box office.
